'End of Red October' on Discovery Science (Eng) 

Nuclear powered submarines were the pride of the Soviet Empire. Now the radioactive remains of the Northern fleet pose danger to the environment: In Murmansk, an international team of engineers takes on the challenge to secure the radioactive waste and safely put to rest this legacy of the Cold War.
